description.Name: description
description.Value:
This is a pure Judo groundwork hold down sequence. This is a key aspect of the KSR Jujitsu system especially at lower belt levels. Understanding this sequence leads into more complicated combinations and pins but these hold downs are the key base.

Kyu Shin Ryu is an extensive and eclectic martial art. It combines elements of Aikijujitsu, Jujitsu, Judo, Karate, Aikido, Gung Fu, Kyusho Jitsu and Kali. Kyu Shin Ryu has its own syllabus and curriculum having integrated these arts. To honor the work of those who have taught us so much, we do not just cannibalize the Arts and frankenstein them together. In addition to the already exhaustive syllabus we teach each of these arts in their purity.
